Name: AllergyIntoleranceCategory
Title: AllergyIntoleranceCategory
Descriptino: Category of an identified substance associated with allergies or intolerances.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceCriticality
Title: AllergyIntoleranceCriticality
Descriptino: Estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, of a reaction to an identified substance.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceType
Title: AllergyIntoleranceType
Descriptino: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for a Reaction Risk.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceSubstance/Product
Title: ConditionAndNegationCodes
Descriptino: AllergyIntolerance Substance/Product
Used: This value set includes concept codes for specific substances/pharmaceutical products, allergy or intolerance conditions, and negation/exclusion codes to specify the absence of specific types of allergies or intolerances.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceVerificationStatusCodes
Title: AllergyIntolerance Verification Status Codes
Descriptino: Preferred value set for AllergyIntolerance Verification Status.

Name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
Title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
Descriptino: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

Name: ImmunizationFunctionCodes
Title: Immunization Function Codes
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the function a practitioner or organization may play in the immunization event. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: ImmunizationRouteCodes
Title: Immunization Route Codes
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the administrative routes used during vaccination. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: CodesForImmunizationSiteOfAdministration
Title: Codes for Immunization Site of Administration
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the body site where the vaccination occurred. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: ImmunizationStatusCodes
Title: Immunization Status Codes
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the current status of the administered dose of vaccine.

Name: ImmunizationStatusReasonCodes
Title: Immunization Status Reason Codes
Descriptino: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the reason why a dose of vaccine was not administered. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceSeverity
Title: AllergyIntoleranceSeverity
Descriptino: Clinical assessment of the severity of a reaction event as a whole, potentially considering multiple different manifestations.

Name: SubstanceCode
Title: Substance Code
Descriptino: This value set contains concept codes for specific substances. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 105590001 (Substance (substance)) and where concept is-a 373873005 (Pharmaceutical / biologic product (product))

Name: NGClinicalStatusVS
Title: NG-Imm Clinical Status VS
Descriptino: The outcome of the reaction

Name: NGFacilityTypeVS
Title: NG-Imm HealthFacility Type VS
Descriptino: Classification of Nigerian health facilities

Name: NGGenderVS
Title: NG-Imm Gender or Sex VS
Descriptino: Subset of HL7 administrative-gender limited to 'male' and 'female'.

Name: NGHivStatusVS
Title: NG-Imm Client HIV Status VS
Descriptino: Client HIV Status

Name: NGLanguagesVS
Title: NG-Imm Languages VS
Descriptino: The Patient's preferred language for communication.

Name: NGLGAsVS
Title: NG-Imm LGAs VS
Descriptino: The administrative Local Government Areas where a person or a facility is.

Name: NGOrganizationOwnerVS
Title: NG-Imm Location Owner
Descriptino: The owner of an Immunization location

Name: NGPregnancyStatusVS
Title: NG-Imm Client Preganancy Status VS
Descriptino: Client Pregnancy Status

Name: NGRelationshipsVS
Title: NG-Imm Relationships VS
Descriptino: list of persons related to a patient, but who is not a direct target of care.

Name: NGSessionTypeVS
Title: NG-Imm Session Type VS
Descriptino: Type of session for immunization. Could be in a fixed facility, outreach or mobile.

Name: NGSiblingHealthStatusVS
Title: NG-Imm Sibling Health Status VS
Descriptino: This CodeSystem defines the health of the client's sibling

Name: NGStatesVS
Title: NG-Imm States VS
Descriptino: The state where a person or a facility is.

Name: NGContraindicationVS
Title: NG-Imm Vaccine Contraindication VS
Descriptino: A set of standardized codes used to represent clinical conditions, diagnoses, or circumstances that serve as contraindications to the administration of one or more vaccines.

Name: NGVaccineLibraryVS
Title: NG-Imm VaccineLibrary VS
Descriptino: A curated list of vaccines recognized under Nigeria's national immunization program

Name: NGWardsVS
Title: NG-Imm Wards VS
Descriptino: The administrative Ward (within an LGA) where a person or a facility is.
